titleStmt.title: The young-mans warning-peece, or, A sermon preached at the buriall of William Rogers, apothecary with an history of his sinfull life and woefull death, together with A post-script of the use of examples : dedicated to the young-men of the parish, especially his companions / by Robert Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.B. for P. Stephens and C. Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop at the signe of the Golden Lion in Pauls Church Yard,

notesStmt.note: Special t.p.: A post-script to the reader of this warning-peece, or the use of examples. London : Printed by T.B., 1639.
Errors in paging: page numbers 77-78 skipped in the numbering.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library and the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: their shop at the signe of the Golden Lion in Pauls Church Yard
